#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define F(i,a,b) for(int i = (int)(a); i <= (int)(b); i++)
#define RF(i,a,b) for(int i = (int)(a); i >= (int)(b); i--)
#define gc getchar_unlocked
int P[15],ans;
int Mat[15][15];
int read_int(){
    register int x = 0, c = gc();
    int sign = 1;
    while(c!='-' && (c<48 || c>57) ) c = gc();
    if(c=='-')
        sign = -1, c = gc();
    while(c>=48 && c<=57)
        x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48, c = gc();
    return sign*x;
}
void dfs(int ind, int N, int bitMask, int points)
{
    bitMask = bitMask | (1<<ind);
    points += P[ind];
    F(i,0,N-1)
    {
        if(Mat[ind][i] == 1 && (bitMask & (1<<i)) == 0)
            dfs(i,N,bitMask,points);
    }
    ans = max(ans,points);
}

int main()
{
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
        freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
        freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
    #endif
    int T,N;
    T = read_int();
    while(T--)
    {
        N = read_int();
        F(i,0,N-1) P[i] = read_int();
        F(i,0,N-1) F(j,0,N-1) Mat[i][j] = read_int();
        ans = 0;
        F(i,0,N-1) dfs(i,N,0,0);
        printf("%d\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;

}
